Text:
I'd only recommend this to those who, like myself, are dying to see this film.
The watermark is still, although slightly, present. The audio is a little dingy. And, of course, it is a cam quality picture.
Nonetheless, thanks a ton for getting this up. I've been waiting far too long to see this. Amazing film. Until a DVD rip is out, I'd only suggest this for the die hards.
P- 6
A- 6
M- 10
